column1:
Overall Negative Sentiment Percentages by Aspect: 
 
Cleaniness: 32.67%     
Amenities: 20.91%     
Location: 22.84%     
Services: 30.25%     
General: 38.26%     
Value: 33.45%

Suggestions for Improvement: 

Cleaniness: Implement rigorous cleaning procedures and regularly inspect the premises to ensure they meet hygienic standards.
Amenities: Incorporate more features such as a restaurant, gym, or spa to attract more guests.
Location: Ensure the property is conveniently located near local attractions and amenities to make it easier for guests to explore the area.
Services: Provide additional services such as laundry, room service, and airport transfers to enhance guests' stay.
General: Employ competent staff who are knowledgeable about the property and its features.
Value: Offer competitive rates and discounts to entice more guests and ensure they get a good value for their money.
